replies.bodyText:
Ah, sorry. Now you said it. I think this makes sense. AtomicMoveNotSupportedException is expected because we use the ATOMIC_MOVE option.
So perhaps doing Files.move without ATOMIC_MOVE is sufficient. But honestly I don't have confidence.

replies.author: chanseokoh

timeline.bodyText: There's one problem with this. If Files.move fails, the existing and working config file will be deleted. I think we can just remove Files.deleteIfExists() if we are moving the temp file rather than directly replacing the original file. No need to touch the existing one ever. And it's not a big deal not to delete the temp file. It will be extremely rare that moving will fail, and if that happens, the presence of a .tmp file may give more clues, I guess?
timeline.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: hrmm.. so I removed this for the regular config file, but I left in the temp file removal, maybe I should leave that in?
